body_html:
I worked on analysing different coin betting optimization algorithms for parameter free optimization with Professor Francesco (@Bremen) during his Convex Optimization class. I can't open full code repository since that work is unpublished yet, but here is the minified repository that would be enough for this feature request. It contains cocob-backprop and code for 1 basic experiment for mnist and cifar. It also has small demo here to see the betting game states in action on a given 1d function.

@bhushan23 feel free to open PR from that and let me know if anything is needed.
body_text:
I worked on analysing different coin betting optimization algorithms for parameter free optimization with Professor Francesco (@Bremen) during his Convex Optimization class. I can't open full code repository since that work is unpublished yet, but here is the minified repository that would be enough for this feature request. It contains cocob-backprop and code for 1 basic experiment for mnist and cifar. It also has small demo here to see the betting game states in action on a given 1d function.
@bhushan23  feel free to open PR from that and let me know if anything is needed.
body:
I worked on analysing different coin betting optimization algorithms for parameter free optimization with Professor Francesco (@bremen) during his Convex Optimization [class](http://francesco.orabona.com/teaching.html#CSE592). I can't open full code repository since that work is unpublished yet, but [here](https://github.com/HarshTrivedi/coin-betting-optimizers-pytorch) is the minified repository that would be enough for this feature request. It contains cocob-backprop and code for 1 basic experiment for mnist and cifar. It also has small demo [here](https://github.com/HarshTrivedi/coin-betting-optimizers-pytorch) to see the betting game states in action on a given 1d function.

@bhushan23  feel free to open PR from that and let me know if anything is needed.
